price: They used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, will we really be raised again?
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
